HacknetExtension.Name: Modren School : Computer Department II
HacknetExtension.Description:
欢迎来到 摩登中学. 您的操作系统基于 Open-eOS, 需要连接到 摩登中学校内互联网络环境 以完成激活 在进一步开始前, 请 注册或登录 您的 eOS 账号以完成身份验证 将为您自动 注册或登录 以下服务: Jmail 免费邮箱服务
作者提示:破解完不要第一时间清空log文件夹,里面可能有很多线索
HacknetExtension.WorkshopDescription:
[h1]欢迎来到 摩登中学.[/h1] 摩登中学是省级重点公立中等学校, 拥有初中部与高中部. 随着互联网技术的发展, 为使学生们适应新时代, 摩登中学进行了 信息技术进校园 教学与学校环境的改良.
为了隔绝外部的干扰, 给校内一个独立的网络环境, 摩登中学搭建并运营着全国唯一校内类互联网网络环境:
Modern School Inter Network Environment 摩登中学校内互联网络环境
简称: 摩登校网.
在校内, 学生与社团, 或部皆可以合规的前提下 在摩登校网上搭建属于自己的服务器, 为摩登校网上的其他学生提供信息服务.
校内大部分教学辅助系统也逐渐使用到摩登校网. 因此, 学校在摩登校网内搭建的教学系统极大的提高了学生们的学习效率. 拥有了摩登校网后, 学校内的一切都变得丰富多样.
你是一名昨天才加入计算机部二社的成员, 你发现计算机部二社的部长----Tom 在背地里好像干着什么不为人知的勾当.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[h1]Welcome to Modern School.[/h1] Modern School is a provincial key public secondary school, which with a junior high school and a senior high school. With the development of Internet technology, in order to make students adapt to the new era, Modern School carried out "Information Technology into Campus" teaching and improvement of school environment.
In order to isolate external interference and give the school an independent network environment, Modern School builds and operates the only Internet-like school network environment:
Modern School Inter Network Environment
Abbreviation: Modern School Network.
In the school, students and clubs can build their own servers on the Modern School Network under the premise of compliance, and provide information services for other students on the Modern School Network.
Most of the teaching assistance systems in the school are gradually using the Modern School Network. Therefore, the teaching system built by the school in the Modern School Network has greatly improved the learning efficiency of the students. With the Modern School Network, everything in the school becomes rich and diverse.
You are a member who only joined the Computer Department's Second Society yesterday, and you discovered that the head of the Computer Department's Second Society---Tom.
It seems like they are doing something unknown behind the scenes.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[h2]NOTICE![/h2] 你需要 Hacknet - Labyrinths(DLC) 来使用这个扩展. You need Hacknet - Labyrinths(DLC) to use this Extension.
